articles.description: Finch heads to the beach to freshen up for the tour of New Zealand after a nightmare season with Melbourne Renegades
articles.content: Australia's T20 captain Aaron Finch believes players will need to be rested from tours moving forward as he thinks months on end in Covid-19 bubbles are unsustainable following a nightmare BBL season… [+4879 chars]

articles.title: Arsenal avenge FA Cup exit with win over Southampton | The World - The World Game
articles.description: Arsenal earned revenge for their FA Cup defeat to Southampton by coming from behind to beat Ralph Hasenhuttl's side 3-1 at St Mary's in the Premier League on Wednesday (AEDT).
articles.content: Having suffered a 1-0 loss on the same ground three days earlier, Arsenal looked a different team as they attacked with great panache, but fell behind to a superb Stuart Armstrong strike after three … [+1394 chars]
